title: Sri Lankans deserve to have their voices heard: New Zealand Ambassador
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankans deserve to have their voices heard, says the Ambassador of New Zealand to Sri Lanka, Michael Appleton.
In a tweet, the Ambassador states that New Zealand is concerned regarding the decision of Sri Lanka to impose a State of Emergency without providing clear rationale.
New Zealand encourages all to focus on solving Sri Lanka’s political and economic challenges.
Sri Lankans deserve to have their voices heard: New Zealand Ambassador
